name: Ajani Goldmane
oracle_text: +1: You gain 2 life.
−1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
−6: Create a white Avatar creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."

name: Ajani's Mantra
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"He hasn't returned to the Cloud Forest. But I can still sense his calming presence."
—Zaliki of Naya

name: Ajani's Pridemate
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.
flavor_text:
"When one of us prospers, the pride prospers."
—Jazal Goldmane

name: Angelic Arbiter
oracle_text: Flying
Each opponent who cast a spell this turn can't attack with creatures.
Each opponent who attacked with a creature this turn can't cast spells.

name: Armored Ascension
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Plains you control and has flying.
flavor_text: With skill and strength honed upon the prairie, Naxtil won his battles high above it.

name: Assault Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"Fine soldiers guarded the northern front. They waited for two-legged foes and left the skies unheeded."
—General Avitora

name: Baneslayer Angel
oracle_text: Flying, first strike, lifelink, protection from Demons and from Dragons
flavor_text: Some angels protect the meek and innocent. Others seek out and smite evil wherever it lurks.

name: Blinding Mage
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: "I carry the light of truth. Do not pity those it blinds, for they never had eyes to see."

name: Celestial Purge
oracle_text: Exile target black or red permanent.
flavor_text:
"They say only the good die young. Obviously, you are one of the exceptions."
—Delrobah, cleric of Ivora Gate

name: Cloud Crusader
oracle_text: Flying
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: Each crusader bonds with a griffin fledgling while still a child, and the two grow up as siblings.

name: Condemn
oracle_text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
flavor_text:
"No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now."
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

name: Day of Judgment
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures.

name: Elite Vanguard
flavor_text: The vanguard is skilled at waging war alone. The enemy is often defeated before its reinforcements reach the front.

name: Excommunicate
oracle_text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"Our law prohibits capital punishment. We believe even the gravest offenders have the chance to redeem themselves."
—Torian Sha, soul warden

name: Goldenglow Moth
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Goldenglow Moth blocks, you may gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"Little moth, fluttering bright,
What luck will you bring tonight?"
—Benalish children's rhyme

name: Holy Strength
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
flavor_text:
"Born under the sun, the first child will seek the foundation of honor and be fortified by its righteousness."
—Codex of the Constellari

name: Honor of the Pure
oracle_text: White creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text: Together the soldiers were like a golden blade, cutting down their enemies and scarring the darkness.

name: Infantry Veteran
oracle_text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Any fool can pick up a sword and charge into battle. To emerge alive at the end, that is a gift that comes from leadership and experience."

name: Inspired Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Impossible! How could they overwhelm us? We had barricades, war elephants, . . . and they were barely a tenth of our number!"
—General Avitora

name: Knight Exemplar
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Other Knight creatures you control get +1/+1 and have indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

name: Leyline of Sanctity
oracle_text: If Leyline of Sanctity is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Mighty Leap
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."
—Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

name: Pacifism
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

name: Palace Guard
oracle_text: Palace Guard can block any number of creatures.
flavor_text: "I'm not nearly as bothered by being outnumbered as I am by their foul stench."

name: Roc Egg
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Roc Egg dies, create a 3/3 white Bird creature token with flying.

name: Safe Passage
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.
flavor_text: With one flap of her wings, the angel beat back the fires of war.

name: Serra Angel
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text: Perfect justice in service of a perfect will.

name: Serra Ascendant
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
As long as you have 30 or more life, Serra Ascendant gets +5/+5 and has flying.

name: Siege Mastodon
flavor_text:
"The walls of the wicked will fall before us. Ready the siege engines. We proceed to war!"
—General Avitora

name: Silence
oracle_text: Your opponents can't cast spells this turn. (Spells cast before this resolves are unaffected.)
flavor_text:
"Take a quiet moment to reflect on your sins."
—Cleph, Order of Redeemed Souls

name: Silvercoat Lion
flavor_text:
"In the wild, white fur like mine is an aberration. We lack natural camouflage, but the inability to hide encourages other strengths."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Solemn Offering
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"A relic donation is suggested."
"The suggestion is mandatory."
—Temple signs

name: Squadron Hawk
oracle_text: Flying
When Squadron Hawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Squadron Hawk, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Stormfront Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"At summer's end, the pegasus herd stampedes across the sky. Their silent footfalls taunt the clouds and bid the rains to come."
—Stormfront fable

name: Sun Titan
oracle_text: Vigilance
Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: A blazing sun that never sets.

name: Tireless Missionaries
oracle_text: When Tireless Missionaries enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: If they succeed in their holy work, their order will vanish into welcome obscurity, for there will be no more souls to redeem.

name: Vengeful Archon
oracle_text: Flying
{X}: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to you this turn. If damage is prevented this way, Vengeful Archon deals that much damage to target player or planeswalker.

name: War Priest of Thune
oracle_text: When War Priest of Thune enters the battlefield, you may destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: "Let nothing take away from the purity of swords clashing or of arrows taking flight toward the breast of evil."

name: White Knight
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)

name: Wild Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Farmers typically keep their flocks at thirteen sheep—one to distract the griffins while they take the other twelve to market.

name: Æther Adept
oracle_text: When Aether Adept enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Some mages do their best work in solitude. Others do their best work creating it.

name: Air Servant
oracle_text: Flying
{2}{U}: Tap target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Wind is forceful, yet ephemeral. It can knock a dragon out of the sky, yet pass through the smallest crack unhindered."
—Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

name: Alluring Siren
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks you this turn if able.
flavor_text:
"The ground polluted floats with human gore,
And human carnage taints the dreadful shore
Fly swift the dangerous coast: let every ear
Be stopp'd against the song! 'tis death to hear!"
—Homer, The Odyssey, trans. Pope

name: Armored Cancrix
flavor_text: Creatures displaced from time still turn up every year, stranded by the temporal disaster that once swept across Dominaria.

name: Augury Owl
oracle_text: Flying
When Augury Owl enters the battlefield, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Azure Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: More so than "storm" or "pirate," "drake" is the word a sailor least wants to hear.

name: Call to Mind
oracle_text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"It's hard to say which is more satisfying: the search for that missing piece or fitting that piece into place."
—Evo Ragus

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Clone
oracle_text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.
flavor_text: The shapeshifter mimics with a twin's esteem and a mirror's cruelty.

name: Cloud Elemental
oracle_text: Flying
Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text:
"The sky teems with just as much life as the forest or the deep seas."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Conundrum Sphinx
oracle_text: Flying

Whenever Conundrum Sphinx attacks, each player chooses a card name. Then each player reveals the top card of their library. If the card a player revealed has the name they chose, that player puts it into their hand. If it doesn't, that player puts it on the bottom of their library.

name: Diminish
oracle_text: Target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"‘That was a narrow escape!' said Alice, a good deal frightened at the sudden change, but very glad to find herself still in existence."
—Lewis Carroll, Alice's Adventures in Wonderland

name: Flashfreeze
oracle_text: Counter target red or green spell.
flavor_text:
"Your downfall was not your ignorance, your weakness, or your hubris, but your warm blood."
—Heidar, Rimewind master

name: Foresee
oracle_text: Scry 4, then draw two cards. (To scry 4, look at the top four cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: Two eyes to see what could be, two eyes to see what will.

name: Frost Titan
oracle_text: Whenever Frost Titan becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}.
Whenever Frost Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Harbor Serpent
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Harbor Serpent can't attack unless there are five or more Islands on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Like most giant monsters villagers worship as gods, it proves a fickle master.

name: Ice Cage
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy Ice Cage.

name: Jace Beleren
oracle_text: +2: Each player draws a card.
−1: Target player draws a card.
−10: Target player puts the top twenty cards of their library into their graveyard.

name: Jace's Erasure
oracle_text: Whenever you draw a card, you may have target player put the top card of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text: "You should try to clear your mind of idle thoughts. And if you can't, I will."

name: Jace's Ingenuity
oracle_text: Draw three cards.
flavor_text: "Brute force can sometimes kick down a locked door, but knowledge is a skeleton key."

name: Leyline of Anticipation
oracle_text: If Leyline of Anticipation is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
You may cast spells as though they had flash. (You may cast them any time you could cast an instant.)

name: Mana Leak
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

name: Maritime Guard
flavor_text: Once common in the Kapsho Seas, merfolk were hunted almost to extinction. They survived those dark days and emerged calculating and determined to endure.

name: Mass Polymorph
oracle_text: Exile all creatures you control, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal that many creature cards. Put all creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

name: Merfolk Sovereign
oracle_text: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Target Merfolk creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "Be like the sea: flow around that which is unmovable; for everything else, crash into it unrelentingly."

name: Merfolk Spy
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Whenever Merfolk Spy deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals a card at random from their hand.

name: Mind Control
oracle_text: Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"The mind: a great weapon and an even greater weakness."
—Jace Beleren

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

name: Phantom Beast
oracle_text: When Phantom Beast becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor_text: As insubstantial as fear, and as dangerous.

name: Preordain
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Redirect
oracle_text: You may choose new targets for target spell.
flavor_text:
"Your strategy is marvelous. I've just made a few minor adjustments."
—Veris, watcher of Indi Keep

name: Scroll Thief
oracle_text: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: I've learned how to disable wards, pick locks, and decode the Agaran language—all before even reading the scroll!

name: Sleep
oracle_text: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.
flavor_text:
"I give them dreams so wondrous that they hesitate to return to the world of the conscious."
—Garild, merfolk mage

name: Stormtide Leviathan
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
All lands are Islands in addition to their other types.
Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack.

name: Time Reversal
oracle_text: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile Time Reversal.
flavor_text:
"Optimists see the world as they wish it to be. Pessimists see the world as it is. Must these roles be mutually exclusive?"
—Evo Ragus

name: Tome Scour
oracle_text: Target player puts the top five cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text: Genius is overrated, especially when it's someone else's.

name: Traumatize
oracle_text: Target player puts the top half of their library, rounded down, into their graveyard.
flavor_text: He was left with just enough memory to understand what he had lost.

name: Unsummon
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"You're trespassing in my reality. Ask permission next time."
—Simun the Quiet

name: Wall of Frost
oracle_text: Defender
Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text:
"I welcome it. The pasture is cleared of weeds and the wolves are frozen solid."
—Lumi, goatherd

name: Water Servant
oracle_text: {U}: Water Servant gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{U}: Water Servant gets -1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"This creature has innate perceptiveness. It knows when to rise and when to vanish into the tides."
—Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

name: Assassinate
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text:
"This is how wars are won—not with armies of soldiers but with a single knife blade, artfully placed."
—Yurin, royal assassin

name: Barony Vampire
flavor_text: "Poor little sun-dweller out past curfew. And to think, you might have survived if it wasn't so close to suppertime."

name: Black Knight
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)

name: Blood Tithe
oracle_text: Each opponent loses 3 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
flavor_text: The Crimson Throne may be empty, but its coffers are full.

name: Bloodthrone Vampire
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The underclass often forget that they are not tenants, or servants, but property."

name: Bog Raiders
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: Zombies are the perfect marshland fighters—they don't need to breathe and they don't care what they step in.

name: Captivating Vampire
oracle_text: Other Vampire creatures you control get +1/+1.
Tap five untapped Vampires you control: Gain control of target creature. It becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types.

name: Child of Night
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: A vampire enacts vengeance on the entire world, claiming her debt two tiny pinpricks at a time.

name: Corrupt
oracle_text: Corrupt deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
flavor_text: The power of the fens sleeps lightly, and always awakens hungry.

name: Dark Tutelage
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor_text:
"It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness."
—Seneca, Epistles, trans. Gummere

name: Deathmark
oracle_text: Destroy target green or white creature.
flavor_text: There are few ways to escape the deathmark: bargaining with a demon, washing in the fabled waters of youth, and of course, death.

name: Demon of Death's Gate
oracle_text: You may pay 6 life and sacrifice three black creatures rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Flying, trample
flavor_text: The locks on the cages of the damned are opened with keys of marrow, sinew, and blood.

name: Diabolic Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The wise always keep an ear open to the whispers of power.

name: Disentomb
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The armies of the dead always report well rested.

name: Doom Blade
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor_text: The void is without substance but cuts like steel.

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one."
—Liliana Vess

name: Grave Titan
oracle_text: Deathtouch
Whenever Grave Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
flavor_text: Death in form and function.

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Only a thin layer of dirt separates civilization from an undead apocalypse.

name: Haunting Echoes
oracle_text: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard other than basic land cards. For each card exiled this way, search that player's library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

name: Howling Banshee
oracle_text: Flying
When Howling Banshee enters the battlefield, each player loses 3 life.
flavor_text: Villagers cloaked the town in magical silence, but their ears still bled.

name: Leyline of the Void
oracle_text: If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

name: Liliana Vess
oracle_text: +1: Target player discards a card.
−2: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
−8: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

name: Liliana's Caress
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life.
flavor_text: "This might hurt less if you don't fight so hard. But I doubt it."

name: Liliana's Specter
oracle_text: Flying
When Liliana's Specter enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text:
"The finest minions know what I need without me ever saying a thing."
—Liliana Vess

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: Not every thought is a good one.

name: Nantuko Shade
oracle_text: {B}: Nantuko Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In life, the nantuko study nature by revering it. In death, they study nature by disemboweling it.

name: Necrotic Plague
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature."
When enchanted creature dies, its controller chooses target creature one of their opponents controls. Return Necrotic Plague from its owner's graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

name: Nether Horror
flavor_text:
"My dreams darkened and seeped into my waking hours. Spellcraft and nightmare merged to create this monstrosity."
—Sunniva, witch of Holm Hollow

name: Nightwing Shade
oracle_text: Flying
{1}{B}: Nightwing Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"There is one hour of the night even we do not watch."
—Sedva, captain of the watch

name: Phylactery Lich
oracle_text: Indestructible
As Phylactery Lich enters the battlefield, put a phylactery counter on an artifact you control.
When you control no permanents with phylactery counters on them, sacrifice Phylactery Lich.

name: Quag Sickness
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each Swamp you control.
flavor_text: The dread gases didn't kill Farbid. But as he lay in the muck, miserable and helpless, watching ghouls and rats advance on him, he wished they had.

name: Reassembling Skeleton
oracle_text: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: Though you may see the same bones, you'll never see the same skeleton twice.

name: Relentless Rats
oracle_text: Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Relentless Rats.
A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.

name: Rise from the Grave
oracle_text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
flavor_text:
"Death is no excuse for disobedience."
—Liliana Vess

name: Rotting Legion
oracle_text: Rotting Legion enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: Zombies have one speed: shamble.

name: Royal Assassin
oracle_text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text: An assassin is a king's most trusted courier, ensuring his messages are heard by even the most unwilling recipients.

name: Sign in Blood
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Little agonies pave the way to greater power.

name: Stabbing Pain
oracle_text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Tap that creature.
flavor_text:
"You can take the fight out of nearly any creature if you know where its soft spot is."
—Guttor, flesh-warper

name: Unholy Strength
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
flavor_text:
"Born under the moon, the second child will stumble on temptation and seek power in the dark places of the heart."
—Codex of the Constellari

name: Viscera Seer
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: In matters of life and death, he trusts his gut.

name: Act of Treason
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text:
"Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Ancient Hellkite
oracle_text: Flying
{R}: Ancient Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls. Activate this ability only if Ancient Hellkite is attacking.
flavor_text: When a dragon attacks, there are no bystanders.

name: Arc Runner
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Arc Runner.
flavor_text: The storms of the wastelands form quickly and hit hard. Few have anything to do with rain.

name: Berserkers of Blood Ridge
oracle_text: Berserkers of Blood Ridge attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: They take a blood oath to die in battle. So far none have failed to fulfill the promise.

name: Bloodcrazed Goblin
oracle_text: Bloodcrazed Goblin can't attack unless an opponent has been dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text:
"A single drop of blood draws their attention, then they strip your bones clean before you have time to die."
—Jamias, hermit of Telfer Peak

name: Canyon Minotaur
flavor_text:
"We'll scale these cliffs, traverse Brittle Bridge, and then fight our way down the volcanic slopes on the other side."
"Isn't the shortest route through the canyon?"
"Yes."
"So shouldn't we—"
"No."

name: Chandra Nalaar
oracle_text: +1: Chandra Nalaar deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
−X: Chandra Nalaar deals X damage to target creature.
−8: Chandra Nalaar deals 10 damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

name: Chandra's Outrage
oracle_text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text:
"Her mind is an incredible mix of emotion and power. Even if I could grasp it, I couldn't hold it for long."
—Jace Beleren, on Chandra Nalaar

name: Chandra's Spitfire
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, Chandra's Spitfire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I've lit most everything on fire—trees, rocks, even the water. Now it's time to burn the clouds."

name: Combust
oracle_text: This spell can't be countered.
Combust deals 5 damage to target white or blue creature. The damage can't be prevented.

name: Cyclops Gladiator
oracle_text: Whenever Cyclops Gladiator attacks, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature defending player controls. If you do, that creature deals damage equal to its power to Cyclops Gladiator.

name: Demolish
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.

name: Destructive Force
oracle_text: Each player sacrifices five lands. Destructive Force deals 5 damage to each creature.
flavor_text: The end of the world rarely comes quietly.

name: Earth Servant
oracle_text: Earth Servant gets +0/+1 for each Mountain you control.
flavor_text:
"Fire. Air. Water. These elements spread, filling in the spaces they are not. But earth is implacable like a sullen child."
—Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

name: Ember Hauler
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Ember Hauler: Ember Hauler deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Flurk's crude goblin language didn't differentiate between "I bring the flame" and "I am the flame."

name: Fiery Hellhound
oracle_text: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I had hoped to instill in it the loyalty of a guard dog, but with fire's power comes its unpredictability."
—Maggath, Sardian elementalist

name: Fire Servant
oracle_text: If a red instant or sorcery spell you control would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.
flavor_text:
"Elemental fire shimmers with rose hues and, unlike terrestrial blazes, smolders long after it's extinguished."
—Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

name: Fireball
oracle_text: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

name: Fling
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
flavor_text: Sometimes the cannoneer must become the cannonball.

name: Goblin Balloon Brigade
oracle_text: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The enemy is getting too close! Quick! Inflate the toad!"

name: Goblin Chieftain
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
Other Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 and have haste.
flavor_text: "We are goblinkind, heirs to the mountain empires of chieftains past. Rest is death to us, and arson is our call to war."

name: Goblin Piker
flavor_text: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

name: Goblin Tunneler
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"You never know what's going to be in goblin tunnels. Even in the best case, there will still be goblins."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

name: Hoarding Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
When Hoarding Dragon enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, exile it, then shuffle your library.
When Hoarding Dragon dies, you may put the exiled card into its owner's hand.

name: Incite
oracle_text: Target creature becomes red until end of turn and attacks this turn if able.
flavor_text: The veneer of rationality peeled from the mage, revealing the spite and rage beneath.

name: Inferno Titan
oracle_text: {R}: Inferno Titan gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever Inferno Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: From the heart of the mountain into the heart of the mage.

name: Leyline of Punishment
oracle_text: If Leyline of Punishment is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
Players can't gain life.
Damage can't be prevented.

name: Lightning Bolt
oracle_text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

name: Magma Phoenix
oracle_text: Flying
When Magma Phoenix dies, it deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
{3}{R}{R}: Return Magma Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Manic Vandal
oracle_text: When Manic Vandal enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: It's fun. He doesn't need another reason.

name: Prodigal Pyromancer
oracle_text: {T}: Prodigal Pyromancer deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: "What am I looking at? Ashes, dead man."

name: Pyretic Ritual
oracle_text: Add {R}{R}{R}.
flavor_text: The Multiverse is filled with limitless power just waiting for someone to reach out and seize it.

name: Pyroclasm
oracle_text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
flavor_text:
"Who'd want to ignite things one at a time?"
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Reverberate
oracle_text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text:
"I'm not indecisive. I just don't like to limit my options."
—Maxti, pyromancer

name: Shiv's Embrace
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Thunder Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: Lightning reflexes, thunderous might.

name: Volcanic Strength
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: His blood boiled over, and he erupted with fists of stone.

name: Vulshok Berserker
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: He will carve out a legend for himself with his own two hands.

name: Wild Evocation
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player reveals a card at random from their hand. If it's a land card, the player puts it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, the player casts it without paying its mana cost if able.

name: Acidic Slime
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

name: Autumn's Veil
oracle_text: Spells you control can't be countered by blue or black spells this turn, and creatures you control can't be the targets of blue or black spells this turn.
flavor_text: The rustling of leaves and a passing shadow are a dryad's only trace.

name: Awakener Druid
oracle_text: When Awakener Druid enters the battlefield, target Forest becomes a 4/5 green Treefolk creature for as long as Awakener Druid remains on the battlefield. It's still a land.
flavor_text: The druids of Mazar treat each seedcone with respect for the warrior it will become.

name: Back to Nature
oracle_text: Destroy all enchantments.
flavor_text:
"Nature is a mutable cloud which is always and never the same."
—Ralph Waldo Emerson, Essays

name: Birds of Paradise
oracle_text: Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"The gods used their feathers to paint all the colors of the world."
—Yare-Tiva, warden of Gramur forest

name: Brindle Boar
oracle_text: Sacrifice Brindle Boar: You gain 4 life.
flavor_text: The war lasted for generations. The boars didn't need to hunt for food anymore. They fed on the fallen corpses, and the living fed off of them.

name: Cudgel Troll
oracle_text: {G}: Regenerate Cudgel Troll. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

name: Cultivate
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

name: Dryad's Favor
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has forestwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: She grants knowledge of the ways to traverse the forest's invisible connections.

name: Duskdale Wurm
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

name: Elvish Archdruid
oracle_text: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.
flavor_text: He knows the name of every elf born in the last four centuries. More importantly, they all know his.

name: Fauna Shaman
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: She wears the talismans of every creature she can evoke.

name: Fog
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text:
"I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else."
—Lord Hilneth

name: Gaea's Revenge
oracle_text: This spell can't be countered.
Haste
Gaea's Revenge can't be the target of nongreen spells or abilities from nongreen sources.

name: Garruk Wildspeaker
oracle_text: +1: Untap two target lands.
−1: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
−4: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

name: Garruk's Companion
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

name: Garruk's Packleader
oracle_text: Whenever another creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.
flavor_text:
"He has learned much in his long years. And unlike selfish humans, he's willing to share."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Giant Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: The giant spider's silk naturally resists gravity, almost weaving itself as it blankets the forest canopy.

name: Greater Basilisk
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Bone, stone . . . both taste the same to a hungry basilisk.

name: Hornet Sting
oracle_text: Hornet Sting deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: It was only then—to his infinite sorrow—that Gork realized hornets don't make honey.

name: Hunters' Feast
oracle_text: Any number of target players each gain 6 life.
flavor_text: Those who kill a jawspur rhino must prepare spells to lift the carcass—even a dozen hunters can't lift its bulk.

name: Leyline of Vitality
oracle_text: If Leyline of Vitality is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
Creatures you control get +0/+1.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 1 life.

name: Llanowar Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

name: Mitotic Slime
oracle_text: When Mitotic Slime dies, create two 2/2 green Ooze creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, create two 1/1 green Ooze creature tokens."

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Nature does not need adornment."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Nature's Spiral
oracle_text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Snail shell, fern, tornado—the world connects all things in form.

name: Obstinate Baloth
oracle_text: When Obstinate Baloth enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Obstinate Baloth, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.

name: Overwhelming Stampede
oracle_text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text: "You are the grandest of all," said the archdruid to the trees. They became so proud of bark and branch that they suffered no creature to fly overhead or perch upon a bough.

name: Primal Cocoon
oracle_text: Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
When enchanted creature attacks or blocks, sacrifice Primal Cocoon.

name: Primeval Titan
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: When nature calls, run.

name: Prized Unicorn
oracle_text: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.
flavor_text:
"The desire for its magic horn inspires such bloodthirsty greed that all who see the unicorn will kill to possess it."
—Dionus, elvish archdruid

name: Protean Hydra
oracle_text: Protean Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Protean Hydra, prevent that damage and remove that many +1/+1 counters from it.
Whenever a +1/+1 counter is removed from Protean Hydra, put two +1/+1 counters on it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Runeclaw Bear
flavor_text:
"Nature has grown tired of the impositions of men and will begin to outfit its creations with tools for bloody instruction."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Sacred Wolf
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"I raised my bow, and the wolf stared at me. Under its gaze, my finger would not release the string."
—Aref the Hunter

name: Spined Wurm
flavor_text:
"They're as much like plants as animals. Leave them unchecked, and they'll choke out all other forms of life."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Sylvan Ranger
oracle_text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

name: Wall of Vines
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Like all jungle plants, the vines must fight and claw for sunlight. Once their place is secured, they grow strong, sharp, and impenetrable.

name: Yavimaya Wurm
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: Anywhere else, colossal. In the forests of Yavimaya, commonplace.

name: Angel's Feather
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text: If taken, it cuts the hand that clutches it. If given, it heals the hand that holds it.

name: Brittle Effigy
oracle_text: {4}, {T}, Exile Brittle Effigy: Exile target creature.
flavor_text:
"In my early experiments in phylactery, I found that fragile forms have their uses."
—Rocati, Duke of Martyne

name: Crystal Ball
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: It glints with arcane truths to those who know how to glimpse them.

name: Demon's Horn
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Its curve mimics the twists of life and death.

name: Dragon's Claw
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"If there is a fire that never ceases to burn, it surely lies in the maw of a dragon."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Elixir of Immortality
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.
flavor_text:
"Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect."
—Baron Sengir

name: Gargoyle Sentinel
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{3}: Until end of turn, Gargoyle Sentinel loses defender and gains flying.
flavor_text:
"Do not mistake a quiet rampart for one that is unguarded. Some things stir only when they need to."
—Bonovar, siege commander

name: Jinxed Idol
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Jinxed Idol deals 2 damage to you.
Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Idol.
flavor_text: "Please, honored friend, take it with my compliments. I insist."

name: Juggernaut
oracle_text: Juggernaut attacks each combat if able.
Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.
flavor_text: The mighty city of An Karras, with its rich history, built over thousands of years, fell in three hours.

name: Kraken's Eye
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text: It's seen the wonders of entire worlds trapped in the depths of a bottomless ocean.

name: Ornithopter
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Regardless of the century, plane, or species, developing artificers never fail to invent the ornithopter.

name: Platinum Angel
oracle_text: Flying
You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.
flavor_text: She is the apex of the artificer's craft, the spirit of the divine called out of base metal.

name: Sorcerer's Strongbox
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, sacrifice Sorcerer's Strongbox and draw three cards.
flavor_text: Simun the Quiet filled the chest with his most precious thoughts. But in a fit of paranoia, he locked up the memory of where he hid the key.

name: Steel Overseer
oracle_text: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.
flavor_text:
"The world is already run by all manner of machines. One day, they'll remind us of that fact."
—Sargis Haz, artificer

name: Stone Golem
flavor_text: The sculptor, like most artists, put his heart and soul in his work. But the newly awakened golem decided he wanted his creator's other, more tangible parts.

name: Sword of Vengeance
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike, vigilance, trample, and haste.
Equip {3}
flavor_text: When wielded by a true believer, it matters little whether the sword is a relic or a replica.

name: Temple Bell
oracle_text: {T}: Each player draws a card.
flavor_text: Enlightenment is not gained by striking the bell or hearing its toll. It's found in the silence that follows.

name: Triskelion
oracle_text: Triskelion enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Triskelion: It deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Why do bad things always come in threes?"
—Gisulf, expedition survivor

name: Voltaic Key
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Untap target artifact.
flavor_text: The missing piece to every puzzle.

name: Warlord's Axe
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +3/+1.
Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: To split wood with it would be sacrilege. This tool has but one purpose, and that is war.

name: Whispersilk Cloak
oracle_text: Equipped creature can't be blocked and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {2}

name: Wurm's Tooth
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"The great wurm bit down on me. Instead of being crunched bloody, I slid into the space where its tooth was missing. One tooth—a boon most potent, indeed."
—The Tall Tales of Oleander
